title: About
text: This site is in development. For further information about CCMI please contact Prof Timo Betcke.

title: EPSRC Centre for Doctoral Training in Collaborative Computational Modelling at the Interface (CCMI)
text:
This is the developing website for the CCMI CDT.
CCMI is a collaboration between University College London and Imperial College London, led by the UCL Advanced Research Computing Centre (ARC).
Please visit again soon to find out more about CCMI and its activities.
